reviews.review:
una pasada artisticamente, con una jugabilidad genial como en los demas Bioshock y un final sorprendente
PD: esperar a que acaben los creditos

BioShock Infinite ist eines der unglaublichsten Spiele, welches ich jemals gespielt habe.
Anfangs scheint es ein ganz normaler Auftrag zu sein: ein Mädchen zurück zu bringen. Je mehr man dies jedoch versucht, desto mehr wird man in eine unglaubliche Geschichte hineingezogen, die einen fasziniert und wortwörtlich fast vom Hocker haut. Durch die vielen, verschiedenen Parallelwelten nimmt die Handlung einen Verlauf an, den man sich anfangs nie hätte vorstellen können. Die Geschichte hinter BioShock Infinite ist fantastisch und unglaublich faszinierend - vor allem das Ende des Spiels reißt einen in die verschiedensten Gefühlslagen und es wird einem auf einmal alles klar, was einem vorher mysteriös oder "verschleiert" vorkam.

Ich kann jedem nur raten, sich dieses Spiel unverzüglich zu kaufen.
Man wird es definitiv nicht bereuen!
игра сделана для фанатов биошока и сделана на высшем уровне!=)конец, как и сдедовало ожидать без ХеппиЭнда=(дополнения тоже хорошие,но измененили Эллизебет и меня лично это не порадовали.
Great Game

This is a great game, that is partially ruined by console-ification. It's bad enough I have to run the game with AutoHotkey to make aiming a hold instead of a toggle. But the lack of manual saving almost ruins it.
They put so much work into creating this beautiful atmosphere, engaging setting and plot, interesting and dynamic characters. Elizabeth in particular is incredibly entertaining and adds to what would already be a stellar experience even without her.
But, imagine you were reading a book. A good book will take you hours to get through. You'll likely not have hours to get through it all in one sitting. You may get distracted by things going on around you, or have to put it down unexpectedly to go deal with whatever. 
Now imagine that you couldn't just pick right back up where you left off. Or, you may just have not understood a piece of dialogue, or not heard it because you did something that caused two actors to speak at the same time. In Infinite, if you quit or want to go back, you may have to go back a few pages, or to the beginning of the chapter. You may have to re-do twenty, thirty, forty minutes of content because the autosaves are so few and far between. Encounter a game-breaking glitch like I just did? Same deal.
Put it down for a week? Forgot what's going on? Want to go back and replay a chapter? You can do so, but you'll lose whatever progress you had in your current chapter.
To put so much effort into making this game enjoyable, but to get the full experience, you'll need to kick everyone else out of your life and lock yourself in the basement for a few days. Good luck with that.

Итак, перепешу свою рецензию на Биошок, ибо старая была скудна и не передавала...полной картины о игре.
Понравилось :
- графика, безусловно. Даже на низких настройках...да у меня не самый лучший зверь :Р
- и самый главный плюс, конечно. Это Элизабет. Она не вляпывается в неприятности, она не путается под ногами, она...она просто есть. Пройдя игру в режиме "1999 год", я понял как нужна Лиз. Она бросает аптечку, когда здоровье на исходе...ну или не совсем. Она бросает патроны. Ну и ману, соли точнее. Также она взламывает замки и открывает разрывы. Элизабет - живой человек. В мирное время она с интересом осматривает лавки, дома и если наткнется на отмычку, то скажет. Вообщем, один из лучших напарников(мое мнение)
- геймплей. Оружия и способностей(энергетиков) не так уж и много. Но их можно комбинировать и улучшать по ходу игры. Пройти с одним энергетиком или оружием вам не получится.
- город Колумбия. Ну это просто прекрасно. А особенно понравились поездки на рельсах(ууиии). Большие локации, живой мир(начало). И хочется облазить каждый уголок. Ведь можно найти секретное место : книжечку повстанцев или экстракт(увеличивает 1 из 3. Ману, или здоровье, или щит)
- враги. Их немного, но их хватает. Враги берут числом и слаженной работой. Против каждого есть своя тактика. Ворон? Поднимаем с помощью "лошадки" и растреливаем. Робот? Обрабатываем водой или "Шок-жокеем" и расстреливаем. Механик?...а тут придется попотеть.
- сюжет и финал. Тут я промолчу. Спойлеры, спойлеры ;)

Минусы...их для меня нет.


Что же такое Bioshock Infinite? Это Bioshock + Dishonored + Элизабет :3
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=218856717
10/10



И вот, наконец-то, дошли руки, чтобы написать очередную рецензию. Итак, сегодня это Биошок Инфинит : Морская Могила - Эпизод Второй. Начну же свой простенький обзор.

Из плюсов хочу выделить следующее: 
- сюжет. Действие игры начинается с видения Элизабет, где она бежит за Салли по улицам Парижа. После того, как она проснулась, она видит Атласа и его…банду. Атлас и Лиз заключают сделку : Салли на спасение Атласа и его…банды. Дальше говорить ничего не буду о сюжете. Возьмите и поиграйте.
- геймплей. Элизабет – хрупкая девушка, поэтому авторы делают упор на стелс. Для стелса у Элизабет есть арбалет с тремя видами дротиков(усыпляющий, газовый и звуковой) и плазмид, делающий главную героиню невидимой. Как ни старались авторы, стелс в игре…не сказать, что отличный, но и не ужасный. Всегда можно взять дробовик или револьвер. Но все-таки советую пройти игру на самом сложном режиме. Это несложно, а даже легко. Вам всего лишь не дадут «громкого» оружия.
- по сравнению с Биошок Инфинит здесь возможно взять аптечку и использовать в нужный момент.
- Восторг. Дааа. Его сделали на движке Unreal Engine 3. И он выглядит великолепно!
- ЭПИЧНАЯ концовка. Невозможно передать эмоции. Это нужно почувствовать самому.

Минусы :
- глупейшие враги. Например, если вы вели бой и скрылись с помощь невидимости, враги…они просто будут спотыкаться через вас и НИ-ЧЕ-ГО.
- однообразный стелс.

[b]В этом DLC Кен Левин связал Bioshock и Bioshock Infinite. Он поставил жирную точку в истории игры. Прекрасное дополнение для прекрсной игры.

9/10

Tämän pelin loppu oli minulle vähän tuntematon kun Elizabeth hukutti Bookerin :( mutta sillekkin oli jokin tarkoitus. Ihan hyvä peli 4/5

Breaking traditions, Bioshock Infinite wants to take you on a journey through the world of Columbia.  By traditions I'm refering to the standard online zombie-nazi-alien-terrorist FPS games that have saturated the genre.

Bioshock Infinite feels fresh, thought out, and well executed.  Despite the stupid premise of an early 20th century floating city, you get sucked in and believe in the world of Columbia because of how well the game rolls out.

If you want an adventure to last about 15 hours through a unique setting with intriguing visual styles and technique, then Bioshock Infinite is perfect.  If you're expecting the next CoD...look elsewhere.  

This game is an experience and a journey, and it's one that I know I'll appreciate for a long time to come.
amzing
Great story and graphics, fun game play 9/10.

Absolutely fantastic game. It has a great story line to it that will pull you into it. Once i finished the game I wanted more!
Good FPS, challenging and requires quick thinking.

Having not completed the first BioShock (though I played through a little more than half the game), and having never played the sequel, I cannot compare this installment to any of the others in the franchise. Still, I thoroughly enjoyed the game. It is quite beautiful, designed very well. The city is immaculate, and a pleasure to explore. The game certainly rewards the player for exploring as well, so it's nice to know your appreciation of the scenery is appreciated by the developers. The characters are lovable and easily sympathized with. I found myself speaking to Elizabeth through my monitor at times, much to the annoyance of those around me. 

The story is fluid and understandable (for at least 90% of the game), as well as intriguing and inviting. Despite having only a rough grasp on the BioShock plot, I was able to come into this game and achieve an understanding (and more importantly a motivation) of my goals. I recommend this title to anyone who appreciates a solid first person shooter with a linear storyline. Of course, despite the linear storyline, there is some room for exploration (as I mentioned) and the large size of a few areas prevents the game from feeling too restricting.

Four Stars.

Thai Review for Thailand ♥
โดย DN Studio
(*ไม่มีการสปอย*)
ในภาคนี้ตัวเกมจะกล่าวถึง "Booker DeWitt" ทหารผ่านศึกและออกจากการเป็นทหารเพื่อให้ชีวิตหลังจากนี้ แต่ว่าเค้าได้รับภาระกิจให้ไปช่วยเด็กสาวที่เมือง "Columbia" ซึ่งเป็นเมืองลอยฟ้าและหลังจากที่เค้าขึ้นไปก็มีประกาศเตือนถึงเรื่องผู้ล่อลวงเทพซึ่งจะมีสัญลักษณ์ "AD" ที่มือขวาและ "Booker DeWitt" ก็มีสัญลักษณ์นั้น!! จึงถูกทหารจากเมือง "Columbia" ไล่ฆ่าตามคำสั่งของ "Comstock" เรื่องราวทั้งหมดจะเป็นเช่นไร และเบื้องหลังของเบื้องหลังทั้งหมดจะถูกเปิดโปงทั้งหมดใน "BioShock Infinite"

เนื้อเรื่อง: [10/10]
 - ผมไม่เคยเสพเนื้อเรื่องแบบจริงๆจังๆจากเกมมาก่อนจนถึงซีรี่ย์นี้มันเล่าเรื่องราวได้เข้มข้นและหักมุมเป็นอย่างมาก

ภาพ: [10/10]
 - ถึงจะไม่สมจริงมากนักแต่ก็จัดว่าสวยและงดงามมในการจำลองสิ่งต่างๆได้ดี

เพลงประกอบ: [10/10]
 - เป็นเกมที่หาเพลงประกอบได้ดีมากๆ และเพลงประกอบฉากเช่นเครื่องเสียงหรือเสียงเอฟเฟคคนคุยกันก็จัดได้ดีสุดๆ

เกมเพลย์: [10/10]
 - ถึงจะทิ้งการควบคุมจากภาค1และ2ออกไปเกือบหมดจากที่ปืนเก็บได้8ช่องก็เหลือสองแต่สามารถเก็บปืนใหม่และสลับไปมาได้ทั้งแกส่วนพลังวิเศษก็มาแทนที่ช่องปืนมีมากถึง8แบบ(จริงๆก็ใช้แค่ไฟฟ้ากะพุ่งตบอยู่ดี)นอกจากนี้การเคลื่อนที่ยังสมูทขึ้นและการซัพพอร์ทจาก " Elitzabeth" ก็ทำให้คุณสบายขึ้นมากคุณจะแทบไม่อดอยากเลยถ้ามีเธอไปด้วย!! และเกมนี้ยังเน้นระบบ "กับดัก" จากพลังวิเศษทำให้เราสามารถวางแผนกำจัดศัตรูในปริมาณมากได้อย่างง่ายดาย!!

คะแนนรวม: [10/10]
 - อ่านจบแล้วไปหามาเล่นเลยนะครับไม่งั้นคุณจะพลาดสิ่งดีๆในชีวิตไปเลยและอย่าลืมเสพอรรถรสของเนื้อเรื่องด้วยนะครับ

........"Bring us the girl, and wipe away the debt".........
 'Robert Lutece Say to Booker DeWitt.

As you are probably aware 'Bioshock infinite' is part of the contemporary prequel fad. Therefore, like Deux EX: HR or Serious Sam: BFE it takes place before the events of the original game. Instead of being in Rapture, an underwater utopia gone wrong, you are up in the air, in the city of Columbia. A totally different environment from the dark claustrophobic post-apocaliptic feel of the original games. The idea is most welcome, having a huge open and sunny playground with skylines connecting different floating platforms sure sounds like fun. But ultimately the strategy element of the original games (using the elements of each room to your advantage) gives place to more classic arcade action battles and the enemies are less imaginative. You get to see the city shining and falling apart as you progress through the game and although it has great moments, the dissonance and dark humor are less present than before. If the combat and actual set pieces are definetly aimed at a wider audience, the convoluted storyline is more niche oriented and ambitious. The uprising of the masses and the multiverse deliver many twists that other FPS wouldn't. All in all a solid 20 hours of gameplay, a fun ride despite the lack of real challenges even in hard mode (I have yet to test 1999 mode). The final product seems a bit rushed to actually call it a masterpiece but it's a worthy addition to the series and I bet the DLC's in Rapture are grand!

Одна из тех игр, которые можно назвать Шедевром с большой буквы Ш. Просто НЕВЕРОЯТНЫЙ сюжет, который в конце напрочь сносит голову. Пройдя эту игру, вы будете как минимум пол часа сидеть и обдумывать ее конец. Возможно даже не поймете - на этот случай в ютубе есть много объяснений концовки. Просто шикарнейшее музыкальное сопровождение и невероятная атмосфера. Такой атмосферы вы никогда и нигде не найдете. Она уникальна. Ну просто очень красивые уровни, сильно запоминающиеся персонажи ( особенно Элизабет ). Единственный минус - это однообразные перестрелки (это я уже начинаю придераться). Я не знаю как еще можно похвалить эту игру. Цена, на мой взгляд, для такой игры ну очень маленькая. Вообщем всем сильно советую пройти ее.
Amazing game despite the fact you cant drill people in the face.
Mit Abstand eines der besten Spiele überhaupt. Super Atmosphäre, beste und krasseste Story ever, viel Abwechslung

This is the pinacle of linear gameplay. The pace is consistent throughout your entire journey through Colombia and the story is equally engaging. In a politically correct society, it's a marvel that a game like this can be made that explores the differences of races and ideals as well as the dangers of trusting a single person. Everyone looks up to a single person, Father Comstock, who claims to have been visited by the archangel who told him to build a city in the sky. He carried out that idea and put himself in the center of his new Eden. Everyone simply accepts what he said to be true and he rules the city because he taught the people to let him do just that. It's a fascinating glimpse at what a society might look like with those set of ideals. Oh, and the ending is pretty great, too.
The single best storyline in any game ever. It gave me goosebumps throughout. And on top of that the mechanics of the game make it challenging and crazy fun to play. Best game of the year for sure.
What an awesome game! The brand new setting was amazing, the story was absolutely briliant and blew me away! 9.5/10

Hammer geiles Game mit außerordentlich Fantastischer Storyline die nich immer unbedingt Logisch ist. Aber hey, seit wann war den schon Bioshock mal mehr logisch als weniger? Dennoch, es gibt außreichend große auswahl an Waffentypen. Von einer Sniper über dem schlagkräftigen Karabiner, Maschinengeweheren und nicht zu vergessen die Gatling Gun, zu explosiven Raketenwerfen und Granatenwerfern ist alles dabei. (für die Nahkampf-interessierten unter euch, es gibt auch 2 Sehr Schlagkraftige Shotguns). Manchmal könnte man meinen das die "Superkräfte" überflüssig sind aber wenn man seine Auswahl hat dann Können sie sehr nützlich werden. Ich möchte jetzt nicht zu sehr Spiolern, daher werde ich die Namen und Effekte der einzelnen Fähigkeiten weg lassen. Zur Graphik, kann ich nur sagen dass diese einfach beinahe (oder eigentlich ist) Perfekt. Ich spiele dieses Spiel auf der niedrigsten  Stufe der Graphik einstellungen (den Systemanforderungen wegen) und selbst da sind fast alle Details super zu sehen (nun die Äpfel Häufchen in den Marktständen sehen da natürlich teilweise wie ein einziger Haufen aus). Und daraus Kann ich schließen dass diese Graphik auf mittelmäßigen oder höchsten Einstellungen ein Genuss sein muss. Als Fazit kann ich sagen dass es ein Fantastisches Spiel mit einer hammermäßigen Story und Graphik ist und daher würde ich es SEHR weiterempfehlen.

PS: Ihr werdet bei meinem Review nur wenige Stunden Spielzeit sehen. Aber das liegt daran dass ich Bioshock Infinite vorzugsweise Offline spiele und somit die Dunkelzahl wesentzlich höher ist.

Проходил игру на ПК и остался очень доволен. Irrational Games делают очень хороший ход в котором они переносят игрока из воды в облачный город Колумбия. История довольно хороша, и озвучка, из которой герои на высшем уровне.
Геймплей игры с небольшими изменениями, появился уникальный крюк в небе с помощью которого вы можете летать по всей Колумбии. Еще в игре нам дают попробовать себя в роли волшебника, который имеет магические способности. Плюс есть такое оружие как пистолеты, автоматы и дробовики которые очень понравились мне. Очень красивая девушка с прелестным характером, Элизабет, очень удачно вписалась в игровой процесс. По мере прохождения игры Элизабет помогает Букеру снабжая его боеприпасы в бою или монетами.
Всё очень хорошо :3

Best title of the series so far.
Luv it <3

Disclaimer: I finished this game on Xbox, please read all the way through. Where do I begin? I guess the ending's a good place to start. Buy it. Just get it. It's... just... so amazing. The graphics are beautiful, the story is perfection to say the least, and it's an experience anyone playing video games should have. It has almost no downfaults. The story isn't a giant escort mission. Elisabeth is helpful and just amazing with help and things. The pacing is just slow enough to enphasize the plot and fast enough to where you aren't bored. Now, that being said, there is one downfault. There's a point in the story where (and you'll kow when it happens) the level of difficulty goes from 5 to 10 in a second. In a way, this is a plot device to show growing as a character and the plot showing growth, but get ready for some deaths. Do not be scared of this game. If you're contemplating getting it or just haven't yet, Buy it. Just get it. It's... just... so amazing. And it shows it's not the ending that makes the game, it's the journey.
This game made me feel bad for trying to stare down Elizabeth's cleavage the whole time. Not an easy task, and I applaud it.

First things first, the bioshock series is amazing and this game is a great tie to it! I would prefer someone who has not played any of the bioshock games to get the first one and to play through the second, infinite, and burial at sea. But now im getting side tracked from the actual game itself.. In my eyes this is a greatly done game and the story is amazing, i was impressed. The games performance was stuning as well; no glitches and no bugs. The game looks beautiful and is more than i expected.

To each his own, for sure, everyone's got their own taste and so on, but I literally have not enjoyed a game so much since Mass Effect, maybe since far before that. For me, Infinite was better than the original Bioshock, far better than Bioshock 2 and better than any recent game I can think of off the top of my head. It is in my top three games, easily. The story was captivating, the ending still has me asking questions. the character development is fantastic and the DLCs expand the universe to make it so much more complicated and diverse in a good way. Just wow. 20/10. Amazing.

O jogo é lindo1 Columbia é de encher os olhos. Os gráficos são muito bonitos, devo exaltar no primeiro ato do jogo.
E a história continua excelente como toda a franquia Bioshock.

This game is short, but sweet.

I would highly recommend this game to any pc or console gamer. This game is full of breath-taking animations and gameplay. Not only is it a bautiful game, but the story line is also incredible. If you are looking for a game to buy, please but this one; you will not regret it!
Jogo excelente com uma ambientação tão interessante quanto dos seus antecessores. Uma grande historia e é totalmente diferente dos outros um gráfico muito bem feito.

Ein Spiel das mich so dermaßen begeistert hatte ich schon lange nicht mehr! Das Spiel ist in sich sehr stimmig (Leveldesign, Musik, Charaktere,...). Aber vor allem eine packende Story wie ich sie schon lange nicht mehr erlebt habe. Das gibt diesem Spiel einen sehr hohen Wiederspielwert! Bioshock Infinite ist in meinen Augen ein Meilenstein was diese Serie betrifft.

Ich spreche eine klare Kaufempfehlung aus!

Much like the last two, you're thrown in the story with no immediate backstory on your character, unlike the first one, you soon find out that who you are, where you came from and why you're there. The way through is a little bumpy, but I think it's easy to follow. The story, which I won't spoil, is enticing and exciting, you're to need to clean the brains off your wall when it comes together. This story also has a critique on society, much like the other two, which in itself holds true to not only the Bioshock series, but the sci-fi genre in general. 
However, there were parts of the story that I didn't like, well parts of the story telling. I felt like the story was drawn out to the end and at the very end was just too condensed. I'm not saying it was rushed, there just could've been a little more behind what was going on. This didn't ruin the ending though. 
As for the gameplay, it was fun but not too new. Riding the sky rails was nice, but the same old mechanics for a first person shooter. I was completely comfortable with that! I really like the way the average FPS feels. I want to add, though, that the enviorment and the interactivity in said enviorment was fantastic, you really got to experience a whole world. You saw people ranting up on a soap box, carni vendors, couples on the beach and it was a whole lot to explore. 
This game was good, I want you to play it if you like science fiction, if you like story and gameplay, or even if you like something beautiful. It's greusome, pretty and magical as ever.
Great story,atmospheric game,its a joy to be in the city in the sky.

Sin palabras. Maravilloso broche de oro para una saga que marcó un antes y un después en la industria de los videojuegos. Buenísima jugabilidad (muchísimo más pulida que la de las dos entregas anteriores), mejora gráfica muy notoria con la implementación del nuevo motor gráfico unreal engine 3.5... pero lo que lo hace tan especial es la apasionante e intrincada  trama sobre la que toman lugar los hechos. Parece increíble la capacidad que tienen tanto Ken Levine como sus colaboradores para escribir una historia tan complicada y con tantísimos detalles, que seguramente no conseguirás apreciar la primera vez que lo juegues, sin dejar cabos sueltos. El único "pero" que se le puede poner es su mala optimización en pc.

Если вы хотите скучно и не интересно провести время то эта игра для вас. Однообразность геймплея просто поражает . С одной стороны привлекательный сюжет и няшная телка , что же еще нужно для шутера. Но с другой не интересные перестрелки и постоянные проходы по одному и тому же месту надаедают еще к первой половине игры. Кто-то говорит про "атмосферу" , но она здесь абсолютно не чувствуется. То чем завлекают разработчики является "захватывающяя концовка". Но чтоб дойти до неё вам прийдется пройти 10 кругов анального ада из вышеупомянутых фактов. Итог: Игра в конце действительно приятно удивляет, та если бы это был фильм то он бы побил все рекорды продаж, но для шутера это абсолютный трэш. Я понимаю ,что проделана огромная работа , но похоже разрабы настроелись только на сюжет, который "не прост для понимания"4/10 За графику и сюжет , а в остальном скучняга, лучше купите Call of Juarez, а на 100 оставшихся рублей купите конфет:)

To those that haven't played this game, please do, I shall not spoil anything nor I'd say to run to get it... CRAWL if you must, there is no end to the great scenes, the scenery itself on each part of the game is amazing but the scenes, meeting characters, going to new places, it's a beautiful game with a really strong story that will latch on to you and make you think, heck I got so hokked even though I haven't played it for so long that I ruined a part of the game by going to the wikia (bad choice, but I still have a lot to go through so I'm expecting a lot of surprises). Don't miss out on this game, it's scenes, gameplay and also the amazing DLCs, money well spent for everyone that have them.

Play this game. It's really actually fantastic.

one of the best games i've ever played

10/10

[h1][b]Bueno[/b][/h1]
[b]Armas y Magia.[/b] Podemos llevar un gran arsenal con todo tipo de armas y munición, muy necesario porque cada enemigo tiene unas fortalezas y debilidades, incluidos los jefes. Sin embargo también haremos uso de los Plásmidos, habilidades especiales que consumen maná capaces de cambiar el curso de la acción.

[b]Potenciadores y Raíles.[/b] Los primeros son unos kits ocultos por los escenarios que mejoran HP, MP o Shield. Elige con cuidado porque son de un sólo uso y están limitados. Los raíles ofrecen un método de transporte y de combate que le da más frenetismo a la acción.

[b]Columbia.[/b] Todo lo contrario a Rapture. La ciudad en las nubes es muy luminosa, casi tocado por un halo de santidad. Y precisamente esa es la idea detrás de su estética. Una luz que no permite ver las sombras más oscuras que se ocultan en ella.

[b]Sombras del pasado.[/b] La trama empieza tan simple como rescatar a Elizabeth hasta que se complica por momentos. Una búsqueda de identidad entre Booker y Elizabeth, dónde se mezclan poderes capaces de alterar el tejido de la realidad, y una guerra civil cuyos bandos quieren aprovechar sus poderes. Y ahí, en mitad de todo, los hermanos Lutece. El final es de esos que te explotarán la cabeza.

[b]Will the circle be unbroken.[/b] A parte de que el tema principal es muy bueno, está íntimamente relacionado con los sucesos de la trama.

[h1][b]Malo[/b][/h1]
[b]Grabaciones.[/b] No recoger los voxáfonos supone perder mucha información importante relacionado con la historia.

[h1][b]Nota: S[/b][/h1]

The best game since ever!

If you play games for the gameplay mechanics, then you might like this title. Bioshock: Infinite is an average (but very polished) first person shooter with vigors (spells or plasmids from Bioshock 1 & 2). Health, shield and vigor (mana) can be upgraded by finding special potions that are mostly hidden throughout the story. I was able to do 20 out of the 30 upgrades during my playthrough. Vigors and guns can be upgraded by spending currency at veding machines. Currency is randomly found throughout the world in chests, on the ground and dropped by enemies. I was able to fully upgrade all vigors and 2-3 guns during my playthrough, but I was exploring and looting everything I could find. There are also four gear slots that can be filled with items found very rarely throughout the story. Your companion throughout most of the story will often (but not always) give you ammo, health and currency when you need it. She doesn't actively fight and cannot be harmed by enemies, but I never felt like she was in the way. She also has an interesting ability to summon certain things at certain times to help you fight. There is also the ability to hook onto tracks and ride them around. I felt that this wasn't all that useful from a gunplay standpoint, but it was nice for making quick escapes or getting to sniping spots.

If you play games for the storytelling, then you will probably like this title. The voice acting is done very well, and the dialog is very good. I found the entire story to be very interesting, and I felt like the writers/actors did a good job of getting me to care about the companion character. I was not disappointed at all with the ending, but I found my saying "What is going on?!" a few times during the last couple hours. One unfortunate negative with the story is that a lot of extra storytelling is done through hidden recordings (much like Bioshock 1). I was able to find 73 out of 80 of these, and I really felt that they enhanced the story.

The game world design is excellent in my opinion, and I felt that the character design is very good. The world is bright and colorful for the most part. The music is also done very well. I was especially impressed wth the barbershop quartet piece at the very begining of the story.

Ultimately, I really enjoyed my time with this title. The story felt new and interesting to me, and, thankfully, I wasn't able to predict the ending like I have done with so many other games. The only downside for me was having to search for the hidden recordings.
I've beat all three of the BioShock games and this was by far the best in my opinion. Good story, good enough combat, and looks great 8/10.

BioShock Infinite is one of the best gaming experiences I have ever had.
If you haven't seen the ending yet this is a MUST-BUY game. The graphics are amazing and it's very well optimized.
I was able to play this on my old laptop with a GT 420M and a i5-540M 2.53GHz and it still looked amazing and preformed pretty well. The vigors are pretty awesome, but it's likely you wont use all of them. The gun-play is good and the world is very well designed. You'll find plenty of awesome stuff that has to do with the story-line and, believe me, it's amazing.
However the game is a bit on the short side, but it's still one of the best games out there.
If you're looking for a mainly story driven game, you should buy this

Co tu dużo mówić- to BioShock... Chociaż gameplay zestarzał się nieco i po graniu we wcześniejsze części można go uznać za nużący, wszystko było zgrane ze sobą fantastycznie- muzyka, grafika i fabuła (która swoją drogą powoduje niezły mindfuck). Czasem zdarzają się drobne błędy AI (przeciwnicy mający problemy z odnajdywaniem ścieżek, albo zapominający jak się strzela), jednak są one rzadkie i nie wpływają na przyjemność z rozgrywki, która jest ogromna. Tytuł ten jest również świetnie zoptymalizowany, moim zdaniem wymagania min i max są zawyżone. Średni czas przejścia wynosi ok. 12h,  i jest to 12h czystej zabawy, serdecznie polecam!

Ez a játék 2013 év játéka ( szerintem ), hiszen 3 romszor kitoltam 1 szer néztem ahogy más kitolja , de nem unom meg. Durva, de azon vettem észre magam első kijátszásnál is, hogy még nem tudok mindet! Újra és Úrja kitoltam amedig mindent meg nem értettem A-tól Z-ig. Ez egy mestermű csak így tudok fogalmazni. Minden játéknak ilyennek kéne lenni. Iszonyatosan jó hangulat az egész játékban. Jó durván ha mindent meg akarsz keresni és meg akarsz tudni ( Ami 1 ső kitolásra nem hiszem, hogy siekrülni fog ) kb 12 és 15 óra között van. Nekem 13 lett. A történet egyszerűen csodálatos + , hogy nem vagy egyedül ebben a játékban ( nem a co-op , meg a multi ra gondolok mert nincs benne, de nem is kellene! ) Hanem egy társ ami a gép írányít. Elizabeth nevű lányal együt járod be a nem kicsit raszista 6500m fent az égben lebegő Columbiat. Elizabeth egy egyiniség hiszen látod, hogy változik meg vigyorgó kislányból ........ ( nem spolierezek ). Annyit még elárulók, hogy segít  hp ban lőszerben, só-ban ami elégé fontos és jó segitség nyújtás lesz. Vedd meg itt vagy máshol hiszen ha rajtam múlna kötelezővé tenném mint az Egri csillagokat!!!!!

Jogo simplesmente FANTÁSTICO! Jogo desde a época do Atari e posso dizer com toda convicção do mundo que este é o melhor jogo que já joguei em toda a minha vida. 

A direção de arte do jogo acaba por tornar ele uma obra de arte. O "mundo" de Columbia é algo que por onde você anda vê que a cidade tem uma vida própria e que não são apenas NPCs andando e trombando com paredes e etc. 
A trilha sonora é algo espetacular, é algo que prende sua atenção durante as batalhas ou até mesmo quando você está passeando pela cidade. OBS: Pesquisem sobre a música - "Will the circle be unbroken".
Os gráficos que são cartunizados são muito bem feitos, a produtora se atentou a cada detalhe da expressão tanto dos personagens quanto do cenário em si.
O enredo te prende a cada instante, fazendo com que você fique pensando e cogitando possibilidades absurdas a cada troca de "capítulo" digamos assim, é realmente algo cativante e muito bem tramado. Complexo em algumas das vezes mas foi essa a intenção da produtora e posso dizer que realmente funcionou.


Agora um dos pontos altos do jogo é a Elizabeth, como dito anteriormente TODOS os personagens parecem ter vida própria não sendo apenas NPCs "burros" como na maior parte dos jogos. Ela prende sua atenção, te ajuda em momentos cruciais e você nota seu temperamento, suas atitudes e acaba fazendo de tudo para ajudá-la. Você sente que parece ser até mesmo alguém de verdade que está lhe acompanhando durante a trajetória do jogo.

Resumindo: O jogo vale MUITO a pena ser jogado, vale cada centavo gasto. Jogo que te prende do inicio ao fim, que por sinal o final é totalmente 'blow your mind'. 
Nota: 10/10

9/10 Amazing!

The game really gave me more than an average first-person shooter game. It truly saves it's genre from the other FPS games that stand with it that has become too common and shows no more innovation. The game is truly amazing from the variety of combat, from the vigors to the weapons it stood out and felt just like the 2 other Bioshock games that came before it. The story is just fantastic, the game focuses on its story than its gameplay. The ending is just great because of the twists you will find in the story. The only thing I dislike about the game is that the enemies seemed to have just been padded out in certain areas to give action in the story.
